name: The Click Project
description:
The fate of an indie franchise...

-Idea,
-Surexploitation,
-Fan games,
-Money.

Don't forget to use your brain !
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

I made this little game years ago for a jam, the theme was "nuovo". I tried to do something artistic but I got bored and I just made a game where you only had to push a button to win, it was kinda artistic. Then I had the idea to make a metaphor about the whole video-game industry.
